Name.label: Muscle-eye-brain disease with bilateral multicystic leucodystrophy
Primary qualitative or quantitative defects of alpha-dystroglycan
Congenital muscular alpha-dystroglycanopathy with brain and eye anomalies

TextSection.Contents: A rare, genetic, congenital muscular alpha-dystroglycanopathy with brain and eye anomalies disease characterized by a severe muscle-eye-brain disease-like phenotype associated with intellectual disability, muscular dystrophy, macrocephaly and extended bilateral multicystic white matter disease.

Name.label: NTBT (narrower term maps to a broader term)

Synonym.label: MEB disease with bilateral multicystic leucodystrophy
